name: Mathemagician
description:
Note: Not sure the game will actually run

(2016) My first game ever. Made in Sixth Form for a computing project. Built using Greenfoot, a Java teaching tool.

The player must answer basic maths questions correctly for their spells to hit. There is no music nor sound effects. You cannot level up and health doesn't carry over between encounters.  I also regret not adding a run button to the battle system. 

I think I got a D for this.
